TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 1140-1141
TEI.2.document_title: David W Price to Stephen F Austin, 06-25-1825

barker_notes.barker_summary: David W. Price to Austin, June 25, 1825. Sale of cattle. Specie payment.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1140-1141

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*David W. Price to Austin, June 25, 1825. Sale of cattle. Specie payment.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Colorado */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="06-25-1825">June 25 1825*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear Sir In consequence of having the fiver I depetise *person_mentioned*Mr. Beard*/person_mentioned* to sell the cattle for me You will take the whole stock cows and calves at $12 the young stock averaging in proportion. cow and calfe at *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Mr. Parker*/person_mentioned*s*/location_mentioned* you will also receive let me have specie for paper will not answer where I am going I send you back A ten Dollar note in paying *person_mentioned*Mr. Beard*/person_mentioned* deduct $20 for what I owe you My hands trembles so I canot write more*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*David W. Price*/person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Colnel Stephen F Austin*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*St philipa de Austin*/location_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
